fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 lost 57.30 points or 0.29% to settle at 19,386.70. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, fell 0.23% to 11.70. Reliance Industries (RIL), HDFC Bank and Coforge were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The August 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 31 August 2023.
